properties.markdownProperty:
In order to solve the above mentioned problems in the field of software development, the REM tool (later REMUS) was born, which is a free experimental Requirements Management tool designed to support the Requirements Engineering phase.
Both REM and REMUS have some limitations, such as being a native Windows application, not being able to create or delete documents, or the fact that the way projects are stored makes it difficult to use a version control system.
